Post.title: core-spotlight APP
Post._content:
****
iOSspotlight~~~~, itemAPP, . , APP.
<!-- more -->
****
iOS, iPhone. APP, itunes connect, iOS...APP, , .
**** [](http://blog.loktar.com.cn/spotloght-search.mp4)
- wwdcswiftUI demo.
- 1:  icon, namedescription. 
- 2: item, APP, .
****
- :
```
let itemAttributeSet: CSSearchableItemAttributeSet!
if #available(iOS 14.0, *) {
    itemAttributeSet = CSSearchableItemAttributeSet(contentType: .text)
} else {
    itemAttributeSet = CSSearchableItemAttributeSet(itemContentType: "text")
}
itemAttributeSet.identifier = "landmark_\(mark.id)"
itemAttributeSet.keywords = [mark.name, "landmark", "", mark.park]
itemAttributeSet.title = mark.name
itemAttributeSet.contentDescription = mark.description
```
- item
`CSSearchableItem(uniqueIdentifier: "com.hi.cage.CoreSpotlightDemo_\(mark.id)", domainIdentifier: "landmark", attributeSet: itemAttributeSet)`
     uniqueIdentifier,  ``
- :
```
CSSearchableIndex.default().indexSearchableItems(items) { error in
    if let errMessage = error?.localizedDescription {
        debugPrint(errMessage)
    }
}
```
    items, ``.
- spotloght
```
func application(_ application: UIApplication, continue userActivity: NSUserActivity, restorationHandler: @escaping ([UIUserActivityRestoring]?) -> Void) -> Bool {
    if (userActivity.activityType == CSSearchableItemActionType) {
        let id = userActivity.userInfo?[CSSearchableItemActivityIdentifier]
        debugPrint("userActivity id = \(id)")
        /// ...
    }
    return true
}
```
- 
```
CSSearchableIndex.default().deleteSearchableItems(withIdentifiers: ["com.hi.cage.CoreSpotlightDemo_\(mark.id)"]) { error in
    if let errMessage = error?.localizedDescription {
        debugPrint(errMessage)
    } else {
        debugPrint("deleteSearchableItems(withIdentifiers:) success")
    }
}
```
 demain 
`/// CSSearchableIndex.default().deleteSearchableItems(withDomainIdentifiers: <#T##[String]#>, completionHandler: <#T##((Error?) -> Void)?##((Error?) -> Void)?##(Error?) -> Void#>)`
****
, ,  spotlight, APP.
[gitthub](https://github.com/aioser/CoreSpotlightDemo.git), enjoy~

Post.title: Xcode Server/macOS Server
Post._content:
- #### 
    `Xcode Server` [](https://baike.baidu.com/item//6250744?fr=aladdin). 
    - : `xcode` , , ~~~~  `swift` .
    - : ~~iOS ~~  apple .
<!-- more -->

- #### 
    -  iOS 
        -  `remote URL` , .
        - `$ git remote add origin [URL]`
    - <bold></bold> apple . 
    - [macOS APP store](https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/macos-server/id883878097?mt=12) `macOS server` , , 

- #### 
     `xcode` 
    - `command ,` , 
    - ` Accounts`, `+` ,  `xcode server`,  `macOS server` , `next ->`,
    -  `macOS server`  ().  add 
    -  `server&bot`, . 
    - , `Product`, `create bot`:
        - `server` , name. `next ->`
        - `verify SSH`,  `git` , . `next ->`
        - `configuration`,  `scheme`, `export` , ,  `plist`, . `next ->`
        - `integrate`,  `on commit`,  `commit` ;  `manually`, . `clean`,  `once a weak`, . `next ->`
        - `build for`, . `next ->`
        - ,  `add to server`. `next ->` 
        - , . ~~, ~~
        - `configure bot triggers`,  . 
            - `pre-integration script`
                - 
                    - ,  [cocoapods](https://cocoapods.org) 
                    ```
                        export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
                        cd ${XCS_PRIMARY_REPO_DIR}
                        pwd
                        rm -f Podfile.lock
                        /usr/local/bin/pod install
                    ```
            - `post-intefration script`
                - 
                    - [](https://www.pgyer.com/doc/api#uploadApp)
                    ```
                    curl -F "file=@$XCS_PRODUCT" \
                    -F "uKey=you uKey" \
                    -F "_api_key=you _api_key" \
                    https://qiniu-storage.pgyer.com/apiv1/app/upload
                    ```
                    -  [app store](https://help.apple.com/itc/apploader/#/apdATD1E53-D1E1A1303-D1E53A1126)
                    ```
                    #!/bin/sh
                    altoolPath="/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Applications/Application Loader.app/Contents/Frameworks/ITunesSoftwareService.framework/Versions/A/Support/altool"
                    # Apple ID
                    USERNAME="AppleID"
                    #  Apple ID App 
                    PASSWORD="App "

                    "$altoolPath" --validate-app -f ${XCS_PRODUCT} -u ${USERNAME} -p ${PASSWORD} -t ios
                    "$altoolPath" --upload-app -f ${XCS_PRODUCT} -u ${USERNAME} -p ${PASSWORD} -t ios

                    ```
            - `issure email`
                - 
            - `Periodic Email Report`
                - 

- #### 
    - `macOS server` : , [beta](https://developer.apple.com).
    - `product`   `create bot` : `accounts`  `xcode server` ?

- #### `xcode server RESTful API!`
    - [](https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Xcode/Conceptual/XcodeServerAPIReference)
    -  [ xcode server SDK ](https://github.com/buildasaurs/XcodeServerSDK) 
    - [xcodeserverapidocs](https://xcodeserverapidocs.docs.apiary.io), , . 
    -  server: [base URL](https://127.0.0.1:20343/api/bots)

#### enjoy~

                    -  [app store](https://help.apple.com/itc/apploader/#/apdATD1E53-D1E1A1303-D1E53A1126)
                    ```
                    #!/bin/sh
                    altoolPath="/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Applications/Application Loader.app/Contents/Frameworks/ITunesSoftwareService.framework/Versions/A/Support/altool"
                    # Apple ID
                    USERNAME="AppleID"
                    #  Apple ID App 
                    PASSWORD="App "

                    "$altoolPath" --validate-app -f ${XCS_PRODUCT} -u ${USERNAME} -p ${PASSWORD} -t ios
                    "$altoolPath" --upload-app -f ${XCS_PRODUCT} -u ${USERNAME} -p ${PASSWORD} -t ios

                    ```
